detaileddescription.para: firmware block size for one time
Enumeration for image soure when firmware update

briefdescription.para: This function is used to initialize firmware update task.
This function is used to enter firmware update progress.

parameterdescription.para: image file's source, from TLS_FWUP_IMAGE_SRC_LUART, TLS_FWUP_IMAGE_SRC_WEB,TLS_FWUP_IMAGE_SRC_HUART, TLS_FWUP_IMAGE_SRC_HSPI

briefdescription.para: This function is used to exit firmware update progress.

parameterdescription.para: session identity of firmware update progress

briefdescription.para: This function is used to start update progress.
This function is used to get current update status.
This function is used to reset the update information.
This function is used to clear error update state.
This function is used to set update state to TLS_FWUP_STATE_ERROR_CRC.
This function is used to get progress's status.
This function is used to set update packet number.
This function is used to get received update packet number.
This function is used to get current session id.
